    • Constructor Detail

      • Notification

        public Notification(int ID!, int height!, int width!, String text!, int dismiss!, int x!, int y!, String title!, NotificationManager super!, String textTitle!, Boolean animate!, String EventHandle!, BBjColor background!, BBjImage image!, ArrayList buttons!, String link!)

        Initializing a Notification

        Parameters:
        ID! ID of the Notification within the context
        height! height of the Notification
        width! width of the Notification
        text! text displayed on the Notification body
        dismiss! time in seconds until Notification will be dismissed
        x! x Position of the Notification
        y! y Position of the Notification
        title! title of the window the Notification is displayed in
        super! reference to superclass (aka the Manager Managing the Notifications)
        textTitle! title displayed on the Notification body
        animate! animation Mode toggle
        EventHandle! handle to be thrown when the window itself was clicked
        background! BackgroundColor of the Window
        image! Icon to be displayed on the left hand side of the Notification
        buttons! Metadata of the buttons that will be put on the Notification
        link! link that the redirectbutton will redirect you to

    • Method Detail

      • dismiss

        public void dismiss(Boolean animate!)

        dismiss the window itself Caution! will not delete any other traces of the notification

        Parameters:
        animate! animationmode-toggle

      • dismissOnTimer

        public void dismissOnTimer(BBjTimerEvent ev!)

        called if a dismisstimer was initialized for the notification

        Parameters:
        ev! Event thrown by the Timer on running out

      • display

        public void display(Boolean animate!)

        build and display a notification

        Parameters:
        animate! should the display be animated or not?

      • onButtonPush

        public void onButtonPush(BBjEvent ev!)

        called by the added Buttons

        Parameters:
        ev! Event thrown by the Button

        public void onClosePush(BBjButtonPushEvent ev!)

        event that gets called by the dismissbutton

        Parameters:
        ev! event thrown by the Button

        public void onRedirectPush(BBjEvent ev!)

        called by the redirect Button

        Parameters:

      • onWindowPush

        public void onWindowPush(BBjEvent ev!)

        called when the window was clicked and an eventhandle was given

        Parameters:
        ev! Event thrown by the Window when pushed

      • setPosition

        public void setPosition(int x!, int y!, Boolean animation!)

        set the notification to a given x/y position if wished it will slowly drop down to its new respective ypos

        Parameters:
        x! new x position of the Notification
        y! new y position of the Notification
        animation! animationmode-toggle

      • validateURL

        public Boolean validateURL()

        check if an URL is valid to launch for the redirect Button

        Returns:
        returns if the URL that is given to the Window is valid or not
